fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Choose a player during the day to copy one of their winning roles at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Once the night starts, you will gain the abilities, attributes, attack level, and defense level (if it is higher than Basic), of a random role that the target has won as. If the role was nerfed/buffed after they won with it, you still get the original version they won as. You will keep your win con.

> Once the night ends, you will revert back to Echo of Victory.

> If you target someone who has never won, your role glitches out, causing you to die. Pick someone who has a winner role.

> You can target yourself during the day.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Have the good faction lose (this can win while dead).
